Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
public class Room extends Object
Represents a room in the hotel system.

      Returns the status of the room for a given day.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the status of the room (X for available, B for booked)

      public Boolean checkRoomAvailability(int checkInDate, int checkOutDate)
      Checks if the room is available for a given date range.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      true if the room is available, false otherwise
